item.title: China is the world leader when it comes to rare earths. This can be used this as leverage in a trade war with the U.S.
item.description: China leads the world when it comes to the production and processing of rare earths. That may be a key weapon in its trade battle with the U.S. — and ...

item.title: Yes, there is credit market apprehension right now. But here’s why stocks will still rally into year-end, says this bull.
item.description: A rush by fund managers to boost portfolios will help take the S&P 500 to 7,000, says Tom Lee

item.title: Weight-loss drug stocks are tumbling after Trump promised their costs ‘will be much lower’
item.description: President Trump is skeptical about the efficacy of weight-loss drugs and wants to lower the prices.

item.title: I’m 42, a single parent with $372K. I won’t invest in the S&P 500. Am I wrong?
item.description: “I am not comfortable putting too much cash in stocks, especially given I have two young kids.”

item.title: Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy buys record-setting $28 million waterfront estate in Florida Keys
item.description: Barstool Sports president Dave Portnoy has reportedly purchased a new “sanctuary” in the Florida Keys for a staggering price.
